name: Global Harmonization Initiative Association
goal:
Achieving consensus on the science of food regulations and
legislation to ensure the global availability of safe and
wholesome food products for all consumers.

To ensure that scientific correct messages are also correctly understood everywhere, GHI will publish> these messages in local languages, from Armenian to Zulu.
interests: Agriculture, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Antibiotics in food
Chemical food safety
Ethics in the food safety practices
Genotoxicity of food constituents
Mycotoxins in food
Microbiology of food
Nanotechnology and food
Nutrition

Preservation technologies
Post harvest losses
